welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Plattsburgh, where the stunning Adirondack Mountains meet the tranquil shores of Lake Champlain. Get ready to experience our vibrant city known for its outdoor adventures, rich history, and friendly locals. Enjoy your stay and discover all that Plattsburgh has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Plattsburgh International Airport handles all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Plattsburgh International Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burlington International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Burlington International Airport is used for general aviation and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
